fields.name: Converted From:
fields.value:
Commuter (641)
Defense: None
Roleblock Immune
Control Immune
Redirect Immune
Conversion Immune

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Transcend (Day):** Transcend humanity at night. 2 uses.
**Bestowal (Day):** Allow another Unseen member to transcend humanity at night. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you transcend humanity, all abilities used against you will fail. All attacks, all passives, effects, visits, etc. will completely and invariably fail. You will also be purged of all effects, even those that cannot be purged.
- Because your ability is used during the day, you are also immune to beginning-of-the-night effects such as being jailed.
- While transcending, you will also attack everyone whose abilities failed against them.
- You will not learn whose abilities failed against you, only *what* abilities failed.
